Right now, I'll agree with you, but I predict this sidekick thing will keep going. Right now you could use a bunch of Allied Soldiers to some effect, though they don't work as a theme. There's potential with sidekicks we might get later, but yes, right now he's a stinker.
May 3, 2021
hoojeebo
Yep, no Shape Change (his main gimmick), no Suicide Squad keyword or TA, and top-dial single-target Incapacitate means that this piece will never...EVER...see play from me. What a stinker. Even his generic-generating Leadership is lame, because he generates the worst generic in the set. Just no.
May 3, 2021

Without the suicide squad keyword he's useless to me. I'm disappointed. Waited this long to fill out the team, yet he's not on it.

Tom Tresser was one of the great mid 80s Suicide Squad players. He and Rick and Nightshade had a love triangle. It is cool to see him finally made.
